scripts.gauge:all: npm run gauge:chrome && npm run gauge:firefox
scripts.gauge:all-ci: npm run gauge:chrome-ci && npm run gauge:firefox-ci
scripts.gauge:chrome: npm run gauge:compile && npm run webdriver:start && gauge run --env="chrome" specs
scripts.gauge:chrome-ci: npm run gauge:compile && npm run webdriver:start && gauge run --env="chrome-ci" specs
scripts.gauge:firefox: npm run gauge:compile && npm run webdriver:start && gauge run --env="firefox" specs
scripts.gauge:firefox-ci: npm run gauge:compile && npm run webdriver:start && gauge run --env="firefox-ci" specs
